description:
Scandal Gold Eau De Parfum - A Luxurious Amber Floral Fragrance

Indulge in the captivating allure of Jean Paul Gaultier Scandal Gold, an exquisite oriental amber fragrance that elevates the iconic Scandal collection to new heights of opulence. This 80ml luxury perfume embodies sophistication and sensuality in a stunning gold bottle that makes a statement on any vanity. âœ¨

Exquisite Composition of Scandal Gold EDP

The Jean Paul Gaultier Scandal Gold fragrance opens with an intoxicating blend of sweet honey and vibrant pear, creating an immediate impression of luxurious warmth. The heart reveals a sophisticated floral bouquet where jasmine sambac reigns supreme, complemented by the rich depth of tuberose. The base notes of amber and sandalwood provide a sensual, long-lasting foundation that lingers on the skin for hours. ðŸŒ¸ðŸ’«

The Legacy Behind Jean Paul Gaultier Scandal Gold

Launched as an exclusive addition to the beloved Scandal line, Scandal Gold EDP represents Jean Paul Gaultier's commitment to creating fragrances that embody feminine power and sensuality. The original Scandal fragrance made waves with its provocative marketing and distinctive bottle design, and Jean Paul Gaultier has continued this tradition of excellence with this golden iteration. The bestselling fragrance marries traditional French perfumery with bold, contemporary elements that have become the designer's signature.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Scandal Gold Eau De Parfum last on the skin?

Scandal Gold offers impressive longevity of 8-10 hours on most skin types. The amber and sandalwood base notes create a lasting foundation, while the honey accord helps to fix the fragrance to your skin for extended wear. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and layer with unscented lotion to help the fragrance adhere better to your skin. Many users report that Scandal Gold EDP maintains its projection throughout an entire evening, making it perfect for special occasions and nights out.

Experience the captivating power of Scandal Gold Eau De Parfum and transform your fragrance collection with this exquisite amber floral masterpiece from Jean Paul Gaultier. ðŸ’Žâœ¨
